content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I heard that the apartment is in the city center, and it's newly built. So, I was thinking of a price around 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, that's a very generous offer. However, considering the prime location and the modern amenities, I was hoping for something a bit higher. How about 600 euros per month? This would reflect the value of the apartment and its central location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer. But, considering that the apartment is unfurnished and I have to pay for furniture, I think 550 euros per month would be more reasonable. This would still allow me to save money for furniture.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I understand your concern. However, the demand for apartments in the city center is quite high, and the amenities provided are top-notch. I believe 600 euros per month is a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment. If you're willing to pay 550 euros per month, I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have a significant difference in the price that we think is fair. I wish you good luck finding a suitable tenant.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your decision, Maryam. If you change your mind or are willing to consider a higher price, please let me know. Good luck with your search as well.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, I am back. I'm willing to pay 575 euros per month. I think this is a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and its central location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I'm glad to hear that you're willing to reconsider. 575 euros per month is closer to my asking price. However, I still believe that the full value of the apartment is 600 euros per month. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at 590 euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer. I agree to the price of 580 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and its central location, while also being affordable for me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. 580 euros per month is a reasonable price, and I'm willing to accept it. Congratulations, the apartment is yours! Would you like to sign the lease today?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 580 euros per month. I'm ready to sign the lease today. Thank you for your time and cooperation, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Fantastic! I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement. Here's the lease for you to sign. Please take a moment to review it and let me know if you have any questions. Once you're ready, we can proceed with the signing. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I have reviewed the lease, and everything looks good. I'm ready to sign it. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
